body_html:
However, on reflection, the same difficulty would arise if bazel were consolidated on for all platforms.

In the short-term: would you accept a PR which simply updates the repository and tree?
In the long-term: I can either create another ticket to track the work, or leave this one open.

Cheers.

body:
However, on reflection, the same difficulty would arise if bazel were consolidated on for all platforms.

In the short-term: would you accept a PR which simply updates the repository and tree?
In the long-term: I can either create another ticket to track the work, or leave this one open.

Cheers.
